Jazz/Blues septet(?) with torchy vocals…quite nice!

wiki.summary: Jazz/Blues septet(?) with torchy vocals…quite nice!

name: Worrisome Heart
comments: What's not to love about Melody? She's got a wonderful, silky, seductive voice and her songs are amazing. ♫ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♫
IS THIS BEAUTIFUL LADY ONE HELL OF A SINGER OR WHAT SO SEXY SO SMOOTH
Still can't get enough of her.
Just so smooth, I really love it..
would like to hear more of her.
Quién lo diría...esos sonidos que de repente me remiten a mi infancia, y que en ese momento me sorprendieron y se grabaron para siempre en mi mente, se convirtieron en uno de mis generos favoritos
